-1.title: Episode dated 15 January 2017
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Buon Appetito
1.plot: A menu inspired by Italy includes a peach-and-arugula salad with pancetta and gorgonzola; a frittata with peppers & onions, and a cherry-tomato sauce; and expresso affogato.

2.title: Luck of the Irish
2.plot: An Irish-style brunch menu: fried eggs; double-smoked bacon; sausage; toasted Irish soda bread; hash browns; and roasted vegetables.

3.title: Siesta Fiesta
3.plot: A Spanish menu includes spiced-sugar churros with chocolate dipping sauce; and piperrada with patatas bravas and roasted-tomato aioli.

4.title: Stephanie's Favorites
4.plot: Black-pepper buttermilk biscuits with scrambled eggs, sausage and a cream sauce; and lemon ricotta fritters with homemade berry jam.

5.title: The Big Easy
5.plot: A New Orleans-inspired menu includes iced chicory coffee; beignets and homemade blackberry jam; poached eggs, tasso ham, tomato with Cajun hollandaise sauce on English muffins.

6.title: Off to the Races
6.plot: A Kentucky Derby-style brunch is served. Included: ham and fried eggs on angel biscuits; silver-dollar buttermilk pecan pancakes with bourbon-molasses butter.

7.title: Bite Size Brunch
7.plot: A tapas-style menu, including smoked trout; bacon-and-hash-brown quesadillas with fried quail eggs; Johnny cakes with horseradish crème fraiche.

8.title: Slumber Party
8.plot: Dishes prepared are apple-pie oatmeal; ham, eggs and cheese on English muffins.

9.title: Brunch That Does a Body Good
9.plot: A healthful brunch menu includes mango-agave granola with Greek yogurt; grapefruit salad with honey-mint dressing; smoked salmon with tomato, honey mustard and dill on seven-grain bread.

10.title: South of the Border
10.plot: Mexican-themed brunch that includes huevos rancheros with chorizo and a chili sauce; ranch-style eggs over fresh corn tortillas; and spicy home fries.

11.title: Cuisine du Jour
11.plot: A French menu: goat cheese topped with poached eggs and a black-pepper vinaigrette; pain perdu with fresh peaches and vanilla butter; and a white-wine-and-Lillet cocktail.

1.title: Tuscan Brunch
1.plot: Bobby creates a menu inspired by one of his favorite places - Tuscany. Included: scrambled eggs with Romano cheese and black pepper; grilled bruschetta; orange-ricotta pancakes with a caramelized fig compote and pistachios.

2.title: A Royal Brunch
2.plot: Bobby Flay creates a brunch fit for a queen in this English-inspired menu, which includes open-faced egg-salad sandwiches; a watercress, cucumber and smoked salmon salad; crumpets with whipped butter.

3.title: Brunch on the Go
3.plot: Cook with ease with Bobby's Brunch-on-the-Go menu, including omelet burritos; a cheddar-and-bacon waffle sandwich; yogurt muffins; and a blueberry-pomegranate-yogurt-honey smoothie.

4.title: Brunch American
4.plot: All-American dishes get a Bobby Flay makeover for this brunch. Included: carrot-cake pancakes; wild-rice waffles and fried chicken; and a strawberry-shortcake shake.

5.title: Deli-Icious Brunch
5.plot: A deli-inspired lunch includes tequila-cured salmon; white-fish salad; bagels w/herbed goat cheese and jalapeño-cilantro cream cheese; potato pancakes w/apple sauce and cinnamon crème fraiche; and carrot-and-mango smoothies.

6.title: Southern Comfort Brunch
6.plot: Bobby gets inspiration for this menu from Southern style cuisine. The menu includes a collard-greens omelet; mustard-glazed ham and pimento-cheese biscuits; sour-cream waffles with fresh peaches and pecan praline sauce; and sweet tea.

7.title: Brasserie Brunch
7.plot: Bobby gives his wife some pointers, in the kitchen, for a fabulous French-inspired brunch. Included: croque madame; steak au poivre and ratatouille hash; brioche French toast with orange maple syrup.

8.title: Brunch for a Bunch
8.plot: Call up your friends, it's a brunch extravaganza. Included: caramelized onion, spinach and Gruyere strata with sautéed cherry tomatoes; pancakes with apple-Calvados caramel sauce; and maple-Dijon black-pepper-glazed bacon.

9.title: Chocolate Lovers Delight
9.plot: Chocoholics beware as Bobby puts together a decadent brunch, including poached eggs and rice in a mole sauce; chocolate crepes with a filling made from cherries chocolate, ricotta and almonds; and hot white chocolate.

10.title: Caribbean Brunch
10.plot: Bobby Flay is havin' a lime while cooking this Caribbean-inspired brunch. The menu includes mango-and-papaya cinnamon crepes with dulce de leche; sweet-potato-and-ham hash; and poached eggs with sofrito hollandaise.

1.title: Tasty Trattoria Brunch
1.plot: Bobby Flay creates a brunch menu in the style of Italian trattorias-casual, laid back, and with plenty of family-style dishes! First up, some decadent Cinnamon Mascarpone Pancakes with Warm Morello Cherries and Hazelnuts.

2.title: Brunch Bites Across Europe
2.plot: Bobby Flay's making it easy to entertain for brunch with European-inspired small bites that are sure to please anyone! His tasty brunch includes Calabrian Scrambled Eggs with Jalapeno Pesto Bruschetta, Buckwheat Crepes with Ham.

3.title: Vermont Bed & Breakfast Style
3.plot: Bobby's making Black Pepper Popovers Filled with Vermont Cheddar and Scrambled Eggs and Maple-Mustard Glazed Bacon. Put on your slippers and head down to the dining room for this cozy and welcoming "Bed & Breakfast" style brunch!

4.title: Best of the Pacific Northwest
4.plot: On today's brunch menu is Smoked Salmon & Scallion Scramble plus a flavorful Wild Mushroom-Yukon Gold Hash and some irresistible Blackberry-Hazelnut Sticky Buns. To top it all off, a Homemade Coconut Chai Tea Latte.

5.title: Southern Brunch
5.plot: Bobby creates a brunch menu that honors classic Southern dishes. He's making Deconstructed Roasted Tomato Grits & Shrimp with Sauteed Baby Mustard Greens and Bacon "Confit", as well as some Streusel Topped Baked Peaches.

6.title: Bourbon Street
6.plot: Bobby honors Bourbon Street with fried green tomatoes, French toast, bananas Foster and more.

7.title: Sizzling South Beach Brunch
7.plot: Bobby Flay's craving a taste of South Beach. He's making a Spanish Tortilla with Homemade Chorizo, Piquillo Peppers and Garrotxa Cheese and serving Yucca Hash Browns with Bacon, Onion and Lime-Cilantro Mojo alongside.

8.title: Bold Southwestern Brunch
8.plot: Bobby Flay returns to his culinary roots with a bold Southwestern brunch! On the menu are Texas Eggs Benedict and Cast Iron Home Fries with Chiles, Cilantro and a Creamy Garlic Dressing. And a sticky sweet Pecan Pie Monkey Bread.

9.title: Open House Brunch
9.plot: Brunch at Bobby Flay's is an open house with an Orange Spiced Crumb Cake, a Citrus Blueberry Salad with Minted Sugar, Scrambled Eggs with Dill Havarti, Country Ham and Sweet Potato Hash Browns with Green Onion Vinaigrette.

10.title: Bay City Brunch
10.plot: San Francisco-inspired brunch is prepared. Dishes include apricot-yogurt parfait with California granola, and an orange-scented bombolini with pastry cream and chocolate dipping sauce.

11.title: A Basket of Brunch Goodies
11.plot: Bobby Flay's making a spread of American favorites like Shoo-Fly Muffins, Banana Bread with Vanilla Bean-Pecan Butter and Fruit Filled Mini Toaster Pastries! And to impress his guests, he's creating a one-of-a-kind Bellini Bar.

12.title: Flavors of New England
12.plot: Bobby Flay's heads to New England to feature a refreshing SmoothTEA and delicious Pumpkin-Cranberry Scones and Johnnycakes with Whipped Maple Butter. Plus, he re-invents a classic: Crab Cake Benedict with Old Bay Hollandaise.

13.title: Beach-y Keen Brunch
13.plot: Bobby Flay takes a "stay-cation" in an Island-inspired brunch with Jerk Pork Belly and Sweet Potato Hash with Fried Eggs, Coconut Waffles with Chocolate Maple Syrup and Bananas, and a Tropical Fruit Salad with Ginger Syrup.

14.title: A French Countryside Picnic
14.plot: Bobby Flay's in the mood for a picnic brunch in the French Countryside. First up, a Tomato Tart drizzled with an herbaceous oil, Orange French Yogurt Cake with a Marmalade Glaze, Home Fries, Hard Boiled Eggs with Olive Tapenade.

15.title: Brunch on Bourbon Street
15.plot: Bobby Flay pays tribute to America's tastiest block with a brunch honoring Bourbon Street! He starts with some crispy Fried Green Tomatoes with Shrimp Remoulade. Then, French Toast topped with Bananas Foster.

1.title: New Orleans Brunch
1.plot: The brunch include bananas foster beignets; beef grillades, and a local cocktail special in New Orleans' French Quarter.

2.title: French-American Brunch
2.plot: French bistro style dishes with an American twist.

3.title: Southwest Brunch
3.plot: Dishes include blue corn pancakes with passion fruit butter; chorizo-potato cakes with black bean and salsa verde; and guava-papaya mimosas.

4.title: Wine Country
4.plot: A wine country inspired-brunch with Fromage Blanc, Grape Foccaccia, Olive Oil Poached eggs, and drinks.

5.title: Impress Your Guests
5.plot: Bobby's hearty brunch is perfect for cold weekend mornings. It features Gingerbread Pumpkin Waffles, Migas Filled Chile Rellenos with Pulled Chicken, Tomato Salsa and Chihuahua Sauce, and a seasonal Cranberry-Orange Vodka Tonic.

6.title: Springtime Brunch
6.plot: Bobby prepares a delicious brunch spread perfect for springtime gatherings. The colorful menu includes Spiced Raisin Pancakes. Ham and Cheddar Pie, Hash Brown Cake with Pickled Red Onions and Carrot and Orange Mimosas.

7.title: Trattoria Brunch
7.plot: Creamy polenta with braised greens and poached eggs; shaved pancetta with Balsamic brown sugar; honey-roasted peaches.

8.title: Bread-Y for Brunch
8.plot: Bobby gets inventive at brunch with bread. His creative menu features a Frittatas di Pane with Broccoli Rabe; sausage and ricotta; blueberry-lemon bread pudding muffins; apple Brie Panini and a chamomile cocktail.

9.title: Winter Weekend Brunch
9.plot: Prepared: gingerbread pumpkin waffles with buttermilk-rum caramel syrup; migas-filled chile rellenos.

10.title: Mexican Brunch
10.plot: Prepared: Mexican corn pancakes; crispy breakfast potatoes with red chile-lime hollandaise; fruit and vegetable salad with chile and lime; watermelon margarita mimosa.

11.title: Farmer's Market Brunch
11.plot: Bobby Flay takes his favorite green market finds to make a fresh and healthy weekend brunch that features a savory Tomato Strata, crispy Zucchini Pancakes, Salmon with Brussels Sprouts-Apple Salad and Ginger Peach Iced Tea.

12.title: Chocolate Brunch
12.plot: Bobby Flay's cocoa-filled brunch of sweet and savory dishes includes Double Chocolate Pancakes with Salted Caramel Syrup, Mole-Rubbed Steak and Eggs, Chocolate Stout Beurre Blanc and Chocolate-Orange Yogurt Panna Cotta.

13.title: Marrakesh Express Brunch
13.plot: Bobby showcases Moroccan spices and flavors with a brunch that includes Oatmeal with Honey Roasted Apricots and Pistachios, Moroccan Eggs with Flatbread and Goat Cheese, Moroccan Coffee Granita Parfait and an Apricot Mimosa.

1.title: Waffles Gone Wild
1.plot: Cornbread waffles with ranch style eggs and cilantro crema; glazed waffle donuts.

2.title: Wake Up Brunch
2.plot: Two of Bobby Flay's favorite things come together for a brunch menu that's sure to wake you up. His coffee-inspired creations include Scrambled Eggs with Sweet Potato Biscuits and Ham Steak and Red Eye Gravy.

3.title: Say Cheese
3.plot: Meyer lemon ricotta crepes with candied almonds; frittata with thyme roasted potatoes; smoked mozzarella and tomato-basil pesto; cream cheese pancakes with cherries jubilee syrup.

4.title: Brunch on the Run
4.plot: Recipes for brunch on the go. Included: cinnamon-sugar French toast sticks with maple cream; a pressed egg sandwich with homemade chorizo, avocado and queso; and granola-coated frozen bananas.

5.title: Chocoholic Brunch
5.plot: Chocolate is the main ingredient. Recipes include waffles with a white-chocolate custard sauce; breakfast burritos with mocha-rubbed steak; green eggs and a chocolate-barbecue sauce; and hot chocolate with peanut-butter whipped cream.

6.title: Breakfast in Bed
6.plot: Breakfast in bed is prepared. On the menu: baked eggs with prosciutto; candied tomatoes and herb-Parmesan cream; chocolate-covered berries; a grapefruit mojito; and a dirty almond chai-style latte.

7.title: New Diner Favorites
7.plot: Bobby puts an elegant spin on classic diner fare, including chocolate-hazelnut-s'more French toast; baked pumpkin oatmeal with a cinnamon crisp; and pasta scramble with breakfast sausage, eggs, kale and tomatoes.

8.title: Big Apple Brunch
8.plot: An apple-theme brunch features apple-cider donuts; apple-sauce parfaits with yogurt and crispy quinoa; eggs Benedict with apple sausage and mustard hollandaise; and a smooth "apple comfort" to drink.

9.title: Irish Style Brunch
9.plot: Bobby shows his Irish pride when he makes a bangers-and-egg sandwich topped with cheddar and tomato jam. Also: potato pancakes with mustard-chive crème fraiche; smoked salmon; and toasted oats with honey and whiskey cream.

10.title: Brunch in Bloom
10.plot: A garden-fresh menu features Bobby's favorite fruits, vegetables and herbs. Included: strawberry waffles with lemon-curd cream; an open-faced omelet with herb cream cheese, topped with smoked salmon and grilled asparagus; sweet-potato ebelskivers.

11.title: Bread Lovers' Brunch
11.plot: Bread is the star of every dish. Included: croquet-madame bread pudding with herb-crusted tomato; pull-apart cinnamon bread; a gazpacho Bloody Maria.

12.title: Retro Revamp Brunch
12.plot: Bobby puts a modern twist on brunch staples, including French toast, which he makes with apple butter and salted caramel whipped cream. Also: he prepares a rolled omelet with Gruyere cheese, ham, arugula and torn-mustard croûtons.

13.title: Weekend Staycation
13.plot: Brunch for a weekend staycation includes crunchy maple-topped oatmeal; avocado-salmon Benedict; cinnamon-sugar mini pancake muffins; and toasted marshmallow hot chocolate.

1.title: Pancake House Favorites
1.plot: A menu, inspired by classic pancake houses, is featured in the Season 6 premiere. Included: mini Denver omelet frittatas with crispy ham crouton; silver dollar tropical pancakes with mascarpone whipped cream; hazelnut-chocolate-toffee coffee.

2.title: Thanksgiving Brunch
2.plot: A brunch filled with Thanksgiving flavors kicks off with pumpkin lattes and pumpkin-spiced granola parfaits with orange-cranberry jam and maple yogurt. Then, Bobby transforms holiday leftovers with recipes for roast turkey hash with Brussels sprouts and sweet potatoes drizzled with a bacon-herb oil.

3.title: Entertaining Middle Eastern Style
3.plot: Bobby uses the bold and unexpected flavors of Middle Eastern cuisine in his menu. Included: vanilla-cardamom French toast with roasted apples; an herbaceous Persian baked omelet; spiced home fries with cilantro and red chilies.

4.title: Holiday Leftover Brunch
4.plot: Bobby takes holiday leftovers and makes brunch out of them. Included: egg-and-ham empanadas with a piquillo pepper sauce; cinnamon-maple-oat biscotti with a yogurt dip; red-velvet hot chocolate with cream cheese-marshmallow whipped cream.

5.title: Home for the Holidays Brunch
5.plot: Dishes for the holiday are prepared, including baked chimichangas with smoky black beans topped with an avocado-tomato-watercress salsa. Also: fluffy pumpkin-ricotta pancakes drizzled with spiced apple-caramel sauce; and orange-cranberry margaritas.

6.title: Guilt-Free Brunch
6.plot: A deceivingly healthy brunch menu includes a blueberry-pomegranate power bowl with crispy quinoa crumbles; creamy and flavorful avocado toast; a "boasted up" Bloody Mary made with homemade veggie juice; and Black Forest iced tea.

7.title: Breaking Bread for Brunch
7.plot: Bobby makes bread. Included: a Southwestern cornbread strata served with a creamy, spicy tomato sauce; a crisp crushed grape sangria; indulgent banana-bread waffles, topped with banana Foster sauce.

8.title: Money-Saving Showstoppers
8.plot: A brunch, that's easy on the wallet but full of flavor, is prepared by Bobby Flay. Included: an Italian egg bread bowl; spinach salad with everything bagel croûtons dressed with a lemon-caper-dill vinaigrette; whipped ricotta toast with quick jam.

9.title: Buttermilk Brunch
9.plot: Buttermilk is featured prominently in a brunch that includes golden raisin-fennel soda bread with orange-buttermilk butter. There are also recipes for waffles and fried chicken. Finally, Bobby makes a smoothie with mango and cardamom.

10.title: Big Game Brunch
10.plot: A game-day brunch menu brings the sweet and savory. Included: burrito stuffed with salsa verde chicken; chicken cracklings; scrambled eggs and cheese with a side of crispy green onion-spiced mustard hash browns.

11.title: Cocoa-Licious Brunch
11.plot: A cocoa-filled brunch menu includes chocolate-drizzled scones; stuffed Mexican hot chocolate French toast with cinnamon whipped cream; a chocolate peanut butter swirl smoothie; and chocolate-hazelnut turnovers.

12.title: The Savory Side of Brunch
12.plot: Classically sweet dishes are re-imagined with savory flavors. Included: stuffed French toast with Gruyere, mustard greens and double-smoked bacon; ham-and-cheese scones with roasted tomatoes; a yogurt bowl topped with beets, cucumbers and chickpeas.

13.title: Comfort Food Fake-Outs
13.plot: Whimsical comfort food in on the menu. Included: churro French toast with a white-chocolate-orange dipping sauce; cinnamon-bun pancakes topped with a maple-cream-cheese glaze; and bacon-cheddar twists with soft-cooked eggs.

14.title: Beachside Brunch
14.plot: A tropical lunch menu includes spiced oatmeal with bananas, mangoes and toasted coconut almonds; jerk chicken sweet potato hash with poached eggs and mango-habanero hot sauce; and a pitcher of coconut-lime mojitos.

15.title: Ladies Who Brunch
15.plot: A Mother's Day brunch includes a cheesy mushroom-and-grits quiche, topped with a vibrant kale pesto; easy almond sticky buns; and a cucumber-lime martini.

16.title: Apples to Apples Brunch
16.plot: Apples are featured prominently in a lunch menu. Recipes include cheddar with black pepper waffles, topped with sausage and apples tossed in a maple agro dolce sauce; apple-pancake bars with a nutty brown butter crumble, drizzled with apple syrup; and sparkling apple cider sangria.

17.title: Buzz-Worthy Brunch
17.plot: Bobby Flay uses honey in his brunch menu. Recipes include grilled stone fruit with farmer's cheese and spiced honey almonds; chocolate chip pistachio pancakes with salted honey caramel syrup; crisp honey bourbon glazed bacon; and a white tea rum cocktail with white lime syrup.

1.title: Keeping It Breezy
1.plot: Season 7 begins with Katie Lee helping prepare recipes, that are inspired by Bobby's childhood summer days spent at the Jersey Shore. On the menu: a cooling ginger-beer margarita; deviled eggs with fried oysters; crisp BLTs with fried tomatoes; roasted shrimp remoulade; corncakes with crab and smoky avocado yogurt.

2.title: Barbecue in the Big Apple
2.plot: Bobby grabs a bite to eat at Mighty Quinn's, his favorite barbecue joint in New York City. With the leftovers, he makes a lunch featuring BBQ pulled pork corn chip pie; Texas toast brisket cheesy egg sandwich; and smoky home fries with burnt ends. Also: a spiked banana cream pie milkshake.

3.title: Between the Bread
3.plot: A favorite falafel shop and Bobby's daughter inspire two breakfast sandwiches prepared by the chef, who also makes something called a crunchified chilaquites burger served with a tipsy Palmer cocktail.

4.title: Get Your Fit On
4.plot: Recipes include Moroccan scramble with turkey Merguez; orangeade with carrot juice foster; and kale salad with ham quiche croutons.

5.title: Bobby Loves Biscuits
5.plot: Bobby's suggestions for leftover biscuit dough and day-old biscuits. Included: French toast with cinnamon orange cane syrup; a chilled bourbon vanilla latte; ham, tomato and cheddar sandwiches; and donuts with lemon cream filling and blueberry sauce.

6.title: Time to Pull the Curtain on Crepes
6.plot: Sweet and savory crepes are served for brunch. Recipes include smoked salmon with ricotta; caper crepes with herb sauce; ham and cheesy egg crepes with mustard sauce; and a refreshing pomegranate ginger spritzer cocktail.

7.title: Sophie's Sunday Funday
7.plot: Sports fan Bobby makes a brunch perfect for tailgating. On the menu: apple crisp French toast casserole; an easy frittata sandwich; a berries Romanoff parfait; and a figgy bourbon fizz.

8.title: Updated Manhattan
8.plot: A brunch inspired by classic NYC staples is prepared by Bobby and Scott Conant. Included: a Manhattan cocktail; an everything bagel strata with cream cheese custard and smoked salmon relish; street cart chicken and rice with fried egg; chocolate hazelnut batka French toast with caramelized bananas.

9.title: Wake Up Your Sweet Tooth
9.plot: Sunny Anderson helps Bobby Flay with sweet brunch treats like crème brulee French toast with drunken strawberries; Sunny's sambal and pineapple glazed bacon; blueberry pancake bites; sparkling iced expresso.

10.title: Almost Home for Thanksgiving
10.plot: Bobby Flay's daughter, Sophie Flay, heads home for after-Thanksgiving brunch; chocolate pumpkin swirl bread with marmalade; waffle cornbread stuffing sandwiches with turkey, cheddar, bacon and cranberry Dijon gravy dipping sauce; bourbon apple hot toddy.

11.title: Preaking Out
11.plot: Bobby Flay serves Maryland-inspired dishes for a Preakness party; tempura fried soft-shell crab sandwiches; roasted peaches with ham; wild arugula salad with burrata and sorghum vinaigrette; black-eyed Susan spritzers; banana pudding.

12.title: It's the Brunch After Christmas
12.plot: Bobby Flay uses leftovers to make a post-holiday brunch; gingerbread Dutch baby with poached maple pears and crème fraiche; sweet potato green onion pancake with holiday ham and pepper jam; grapefruit sparkle cocktail.

13.title: Inspired by Italy
13.plot: Bobby Flay makes his Naples-born friend, Cooking Channel's Laura Vitale, an Italian-inspired brunch; breakfast pizza with a twist; dandelion green salad; graffle, also known as Neapolitan doughnuts; Campari sangria.
